ComicInfo.Summary:
The Candy Cottage: The story of Hansel and Gretel with Mighty Mouse added to save the day.
Much Ado About Nothing: Is Dinky a bad-luck duck? Mr. Rudy thinks so.
Imperiled by Jungle Animals: Oil Can Harry unleashes a pack of wild jungle animals on Mighty Mouse.
Discount Mind Reading: Mind-reader Gandy offers Sourpuss a reduced rate.
Watch Fishing: Gandy confounds Sourpuss with a new fishing method.
A Battle Royal: A goony mad scientist revives a series of fossilized caveman creatures, who go on a rampage. Mighty Mouse punches them back into chunks of stone, to be used to “pave all the main streets in town”.
ComicInfo.Tags: Gandy Goose,Oil Can Harry,Dinky Duck,Mighty Mouse,Pearl Pureheart,Sourpuss,Rudy the Rooster,Little Roquefort,Farmer Al Falfa
ComicInfo.Title: The Candy Cottage; Much Ado About Nothing; Imperiled by Jungle Animals; Discount Mind Reading; Watch Fishing; A Battle Royal
